class_notes: This course is in the Arts and Social Justice Fellows program for the Fall 2022 semester. Students will have the opportunity to work with an Atlanta artist and explore social justice issues relevant to the course topic.
course_description: This course explores hip-hop dance/culture via lectures and movement sessions. It facilitates cultural self-awareness and tools for self-expression by considering race, sexuality, class, authenticity, and gender within hip-hop to delineate how it unifies people across racial and ethnic barriers.
